name: MTLIndirectCommandBufferDescriptor
desc: An object that configures new MTLIndirectCommandBuffer objects.

items.name: var commandTypes: MTLIndirectCommandType
items.desc: The set of command types that you can encode into the indirect command buffer.

items.name: var inheritBuffers: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines where commands in the indirect command buffer get their buffer arguments from when you execute them.

items.name: var inheritPipelineState: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines where commands in the indirect command buffer get their pipeline state from when you execute them.

items.name: var maxVertexBufferBindCount: Int
items.desc: The maximum number of argument buffers that you can set per command for the vertex stage.

items.name: var maxFragmentBufferBindCount: Int
items.desc: The maximum number of argument buffers that you can set per command for the fragment stage.

items.name: var maxKernelBufferBindCount: Int
items.desc: The maximum number of argument buffers that you can set per command for the compute kernel.
